headline: Best Buffett Stock to Buy Right Now: Sirius XM vs. VeriSign
summary: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway recently added to both Sirius XM and VeriSign late last year.  Warren Buffett recently announced his retirement as CEO of Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A) (NYSE: BRK.B).  Buffett and his investment team also added to certain holdings, making those buys all the more intriguing.
